name: GameCube Movie
summary: Learn about .H4M files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Hudson, a Japanese technology company, developed the H4M file type for Nintendo video games. There are several notable versions of the file type, including HVQM3 (prevalent in Nintendo 64 Mario Party games) and HVQM4 (prevalent in Nintendo GameCube Resident Evil games).

Modders and other GameCube enthusiasts may find H4M files while exploring a game's contents. For example, a modder attempting to replace or modify movies in a Resident Evil game might encounter several H4M files in the game's directory for data files.

instructions: You can open an H4M file with HVQM4 video decoder. You can also decode audio in an H4M file with H4M Audio Decode.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
